ygData.subject: Re: Clerics and the art of Dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow! I remember dueling a troll when I was level 13, and I never thought to use Flash of Light or Root. VERY interesting. I should have thought to use Divine
ygData.messageBody:
Wow! I remember dueling a troll when I was level 13, and I never thought
to use Flash of Light or Root. VERY interesting. I should have thought
to use Divine Aura, too, because that friggin troll cast some nasty
weakening spells on me which, for a cleric, can be devastating. However,
I was able to outwit him in the end, although it was a very close thing.
I will have to remember these great tactics. Excellent!

Flidias Anfalas
15th Holy Order of Clerics, Heart of the Rose
